Html: So i have been messing with adding objects into the scene and if you want to add something that is not attached to a markernode then it has to be added relative to the camera which as i understand it then is that the camera is the origin, but when adding marker node if you add something relative to that then the marker is considered the origin, I need a way to figure out the markers position relative to the scenes camera.

Marker position relative to the scene camera is exactly MarkerNode.WorldTransformation. If you mean camera position relative to the marker, then it's Inverse of MarkerNode.WorldTransformation.
